title: From Glasgow Green to Bendigo
creator_credit: Robert Irvine, Anglo-Scottish Pictures and Films of Scotland
brief_description: The design, manufacture and export of carpets. Highly skilled craftsment in a Glasgow factory are seen creating carpets from the basic design through intricate processes to the finished article. Carpets made for the Coronation, the White House, government buildings in New Zealand, South Africa and Rhodesia and in private homes, including one in Bendigo, Victoria.
